title: A Life Interrupted
description: To fifteen-year-old Sophie Martin, life in New York City is perfect. But when her father suddenly loses his high-paying job, Sophie's fashionista lifestyle changes forever. A new job opportunity leads her family to relocate to a small island town in southwest Florida, a place Sophie does not want to be. Miserable and resistant to making new friends, the struggles of her new life seem overwhelming. Can a local boy named Trent and an injured pelican motivate Sophie to abandon her self-absorbed ways and start over?
author: Lauri Fern
